text: Miners' federation may refer to several former trade unions: *Miners' Federation (France) *Miners' Federation of Australia *Miners' Federation of Great Britain **Lancashire and Cheshire Miners' Federation **Midland Counties Miners' Federation **North Staffordshire Miners' Federation **Scottish Miners' Federation **South Wales Miners' Federation *Miners' International Federation *Western Federation of Miners, in the United States
title: Miners' federation
